name: jira_create_issue
description: Create a new Jira issue. Requires project key, summary, and issue type. Optionally set description, priority, and assignee.

steps.code: const baseUrl = `{{jira_url}}`.replace(/\/$/, ''); const desc = `{{description}}`; const body = { fields: { project: { key: `{{project_key}}` }, summary: `{{summary}}`, issuetype: { name: `{{issue_type}}` || 'Task' } } }; if (desc) { body.fields.description = { type: 'doc', version: 1, content: [{ type: 'paragraph', content: [{ type: 'text', text: desc }] }] }; } const priority = `{{priority}}`; if (priority) { body.fields.priority = { name: priority }; } const resp = await fetch(baseUrl + '/rest/api/3/issue', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, credentials: 'same-origin', body: JSON.stringify(body) }); if (!resp.ok) { const err = await resp.text(); throw new Error('Create failed: ' + resp.status + ' ' + err); } const result = await resp.json(); return { success: true, key: result.key, id: result.id, url: baseUrl + '/browse/' + result.key }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Create issue via REST API
